function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing non-contact methods for completing tasks.","category":"Touchless technologies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensuring that telemedicine and remote operations are reliable and efficient.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Redistribute medical staff, increase logistics
